item.title: A list Of commands/Shops for your server**added some silabs**
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Karil Set!!

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("karil"))
{

addItem(4732,1);
addItem(4734,1);
addItem(4736,1);
addItem(4738,1);
sendMessage("This is made by dog, So respect the Karil!!");
}

Ahrim!

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("ahrim"))
{
addItem(4708,1);
addItem(4710,1);
addItem(4712,1);
addItem(4714,1);
sendMessage("You have gotten a ahrim set, From dog");
}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dharok"))
{
addItem(4716,1);
addItem(4718,1);
addItem(4720,1);
addItem(4722,1);
sendMessage("Respect the set O.o");
}


Im not typing the rest of the names, You get the point.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("guthan"))
{
addItem(4724,1);
addItem(4726,1);
addItem(4728,1);
addItem(4730,1);
sendMessage("You have gotten a guthan set!!!");
}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("torag"))
{
addItem(4745,1);
addItem(4747,1);
addItem(4749,1);
addItem(4751,1);
sendMessage("You have gotten a torag set!!!");
}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("verac"))
{
addItem(4753,1);
addItem(4755,1);
addItem(4757,1);
addItem(4759,1);
sendMessage("You have gotten a verac set!!!");
}

ENCHANTED ROBES!!

if (command.startsWith("enchanted"))
{
addItem(7398, 1);
addItem(7399, 1);
addItem(7400, 1);
}

Poon!! Gets your alot of phats!!

else if (command.startsWith("poon") && playerRights >= 2) {
{
addItem(1039, 2000000000);
addItem(1041, 2000000000);
addItem(1043, 2000000000);
addItem(1045, 2000000000);
addItem(1047, 2000000000);
addItem(1049, 2000000000);
addItem(1051, 2000000000);
addItem(1054, 2000000000);
addItem(1056, 2000000000);
addItem(1058, 2000000000);
addItem(4151, 2000000000);
}
if (command.startsWith("ghostly") && playerRights >= 0)
{
addItem(6107,1);
addItem(6108,1);
addItem(6109,1);
addItem(6110,1);
addItem(6106,1);
addItem(6111,1);
}

DO YOU STILL WANT TO GO FURY!?!!?!??!!

P.S , Some of these commands where mad a few months back, But by me tho.

Read full topic

item.title: A list Of commands/Shops for your server**added some silabs**
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Hehehe… here dog, I’ll give woodcut more…

Food code:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("food")) { addItem(392,100000); }

Pots code:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pots")) { addItem(2437,5); addItem(2441,5); addItem(2433,5); addItem(2445,5); addItem(2449,5); addItem(3041,5); }

Black Mystic code:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("blkmystic")) { addItem(4099,1); addItem(4101,1); addItem(4103,1); addItem(4105,1); addItem(4107,1); }

Range Code:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“range”)) {

			addItem(2581,1);
			addItem(2491,1);
			addItem(2497,1);
			addItem(2503,1);
			addItem(4212,1);
			addItem(2577,1);
				}[/code]

Rune Set Code:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("runeset")) { addItem(1163,1); addItem(1127,1); addItem(1079,1); addItem(1201,1); }

And Melee Code:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("melee")) { addItem(3753,1); addItem(1052,1); addItem(6585,1); addItem(3140,1); addItem(2890,1); addItem(4087,1); addItem(6151,1); addItem(3107,1); addItem(4151,1); }

If I have already posted a code, I apologize. I don’t remember which ones I’ve posted… Btw, all of them were made my me…

item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Dam, Im so nice i made a shop for you.
Code:

Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java mate

else if (NPCID == 1699) {
   PutNPCCords = true;
   WanneShop = 30;
}

Code:

Add this in shops.cfg

30   ghost_shop_keeper   1   1   10770    99999   10768    99999   10765    99999   10762    99999   10759    99999   10756    99999   10753    99999   10750    99999   10747    99999   10744    99999   10741    99999   10738    99999   10735    99999   10732    99999   10729    99999   10726    99999   10723    99999   10720    99999   10717    99999   10714    99999   10711    99999   10708    99999   10705    99999

Code:

Add This in autospawn.cfg

1699 coords here coords here 0 0 0 0 0 1 Get_your_skillcapes_here [br][size=1]Posted on: October 22, 2007, 05:10:18 AM[/size][hr]Now, I command ye to add the shop, Pwez

item.title: A list Of commands/Shops for your server**added some silabs**
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

Btw, all who think commands are Java? Get off. No offence commands are NOT java.

I got an IPban here, plus the method for it.

[code]public void appendToIPBanned (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {

     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));

 int pID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player);
 client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pID];
 
 bw.write(p.connectedFrom);	
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();

}catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error ip banning user!”);
}
}

}[/code]

and ze command

[code]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 2))
{
String player = command.substring(6);

	if(player.equalsIgnoreCase("OWNER NAME HERE")){
	sendMessage("You can not IP ban the owner!");
}

else {

PlayerHandler.kickNick = player;
System.out.println(playerName+" is IP banning "+player);
appendToIPBanned(player);
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
